name: Landing Page Builder
body:
## Best landing page building

### Landing page platform that allows marketers and business owners to design landing pages, automate A/B testing, and manage leads

Looking for landing page? Publish our high-converting landing page online, and use it to start capturing leads in less than five minutes

Our features:
* A/B Testing
* Form Conversion
* Form Optimization
* Branch logic
* Payment integration
* Third party integration
* Push notifications
* Multiple language support
* Conditional logic
* Validation rules
* Server rules
* Custom reports

### An easy-to-use solution for creating your own stunning landing page with no coding necessary.

Our [landing page builder](https://formtitan.com/FormTypes/Landing-Page) have A/B testing tool for website and conversion rate optimization. Features include targeting, personalization, and analytics.

Happy Landing page building!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
